name: Clown Town
description:
Slappy the Clown is pushed to the edge after years of entertaining snot-nosed brats at birthday parties. Turn Slappy’s frown upside down by pranking civilians to your hearts content. Unleash an arsenal of balloon swords and banana peels upon the populous, but watch out for the police trying to ruin Slappy’s day.

Credits

Programming Team:

Chris Santos - Design + UI Programming

David Beers - General Programming

Devon Stettler - Gameplay Programming

Art Team:

Jessica Blask - 3D Character Modeling

Kyle Remy - 3D Asset Modeling

Delaney Kreidler - Concept Art + UI
